titleStmt.title: W. S. Sharp et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2315

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
Sharpsburg Ky Dec 5th 1865
To His Excellency T E Bramlette,
Governor.

We the under signed petitioners pray your Excellency to appoint Joseph Patton as Magistrate in the Sharpsburg district in Bath Co Ky to fill the vacancy caused by the removal of James S Rainey to Cincinnati Ohio. Mr Patton is, and has been during the war a union man and is well qualified to fill the office.

W. S. Sharp
C, F, Sharp
M Hart
Peter grogan
A J. Spencer
W B Grinstead
John Maley
John sharp
Jas McMahen
Pat Carroll
A M Jones
Daniel McMahan
Jams McCane
John W Linton
John McIntire
Wm W Rogers
W W Foster
Martin Welby
A Robert McMahan
A Brown
John H Heges

Justice Peace
Bath Co
Jos Patton
apptd
13 Dec/65
